name: hivemindoverlay
description: **HivemindOverlay** is a Chrome extension and optional server-side assistant that enhances Twitch and YouTube livestream chat by:

changelog.1.2.0: Changes to begin emitting chat messages from the chatClient using tmi.js. The overlay presently mimics chat text in a sub-window overlay. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.1.0: Implemented webpack and built a webpack.config.js. Also implemented node and added a package.json. ~ Sean Parker
changelog.1.0.0: Initial solution commit. Icons and scaffolding. ~ Sean Parker
